name: Lifebind Spec
desc:
Replace Special Attack with Life Bloom and enhances the skill.
Life Bloom generates 20% more healing.
Casting Life Bloom grants 1 additional Regen Bud.

name: Healing Infusion
desc: Every 5 uses of Life Bloom enhances the next direct healing Expertise Skill by 100%

name: Lifeforce Extension
desc: Increases the Healing of Healing Chain by 10%. For every 7% Mastery, Healing Chain jumps 1 additional time.

name: Energy Arcane
desc:
During Growth Arcane, increases ERG REG SPD by 50%.
Increases Grove Wish's Crit by 10%.

name: Transcendence
desc: Every 60 self-heals from Nourish grants Transcendence.

name: Verdant Nourishment
desc: If you're affected with Nourish, reduces all DMG taken by 10%. If the targets are affected by Nourish, enhances their Healing Received from yourself by 5%. If the stack of Nourish is above or equal to 3, additionally enhances Healing Received by 3%.

name: Life Bloom
desc: Using Blossom Charge enhances the next Life Bloom, skipping the cast and increasing the Healing by 50%.

name: Full Bloom
desc: Casting Life Bloom grants a fixed 50% chance to reduce the CD of Blossom Charge and Regen by 2s.

name: Vital Surge
desc: Replace Ultimate, Divine Circle Bloom with Vital Surge.

name: Blooming Reincarnation
desc: Casting Life Bloom increases Life Bloom's healing by 20% and its ENG consumed by 10% for 4s. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

name: Vitality
desc: Nourish can stack up to 5 times. Each use of Life Bloom grants the targets with Nourish 1 stack of Nourish.

name: Gift of Life
desc: When an enemy within 10 meters that you are engaged with (effective within a team) is defeated, generates a Healing Orb. This can only occur once ever 2s.

name: Flower Time Dance
desc:
Every 45s, generates 1 Flower Stalk in the following order:
Crimson Insight, Golden Devotion, and Moonlight Solace.

name: Nourish Essence
desc: When Life Bloom generates healing, 50% chance to apply Nourish.

name: Endless Blossom
desc: When casting Blossom charge, Grove Wish, or Regen Pulse, 20% chance that the next cast of Life Bloom within 5s consumes no Energy.

name: Flourishing Progress
desc: When holding 2 or more Regen Buds, casting Blossom Charge for damage or healing always triggers a corresponding seed (without costing Regen Buds) and grants 1 Regen Bud.

name: Verdant Root
desc:
While in battle state, standing still for 2s creates a Grass Domain.
Grass Domain: While inside the Grass Domain, your Haste +10%. Upon exiting the Grass Domain, 0. Your Movement SPD +50% for 5s, and Grass Domain disappears.

name: Natural Bloom
desc: When healing an ally with lower than 30% HP, Natural Bloom triggers, instantly restoring HP equal to 200% ATK to them. This effect can occur up to once every 30s.

name: Energy Expansion
desc:
Increases Max Energy by 20.
Using Blossom Charge restores 30% lost Energy.

name: Verdant Duet
desc: Life bloom has a fixed 20% chance to heal 1 additional time.

name: Wings of Revival
desc:
When an ally within 20 meters takes DMG exceeding 30% of their HP, Revival triggers, which can affect the same target up to once every 45s.
Revival: Restores HP equal to 50% of the DMG taken over 5s.

name: Bud to Blossom
desc: When a Flower Stalk appears, grants 1 Regen Bud every 2s for 10s.

name: Inspire and Strengthen
desc: Inspiration additionally grants 50 bonus Intellect, Strength, Agility, and Stamina.

name: Floral Whisper
desc: Healing Expertise generate 20% more healing, but healing from Life Bloom -50%.

name: Healing Pulse
desc: When an enemy within 10 meters that you are engaged with (effective within a team) is defeated, generates a Healing Pulse. This can only occur once ever 10s.

name: Instant Bloom
desc: Every 5 uses of Life Bloom accelerates the using of Grove Wish or Regen Pulse by 100% and increases their Healing by 50% in 15s.

name: Rescue
desc: Healing Expertise restore 25% more HP to the targets with HP below 50%.

name: Flourishing Flower
desc: Within Grass Domain, Flower Stalk appeared 50% earlier.

name: Tricolor Revelation
desc:
Consumes Moonlight Solace to launch Flower Dance - Tricolor Revelation.
Flower Dance - Tricolor Revelation: Grants all effects of Flower Stalks, once every 60s.
